attributes.title: Did I Stutter?
attributes.review:

attributes.title: my daddy my superhero
attributes.review:
As a very proud trumpet I was compelled to install this app. How ever after using my daddy Dons app for a few minutes I began to get a horrible brain splitting headache then I believe I passed out. When I woke up there was a MAGA hat fused to my head even though I fully and unconditionally LOVE my cheeto dust covered baby Donald that didnâ€™t mean I wanted a MAGA hat fused to my head!
Then my condition worsened I began to chant â€œTrump 2020â€ uncontrollably. Thats when I realized that it was the hat that was causing this madness! So I tried even harder to pry the hat off my head but it wouldnâ€™t budge so I ended up having to BURN it off I now have no hair but at least I am not chanting that nonsensical slogan any longer. I then immediately deleted this pathetic excuse for an app. While my symptoms were mild my friends who downloaded this app said they experienced the following symptoms...

- uncontrollably buying trump murch
- skin slowly turning orange 
- lack of basic grammar and sentence stucture
- a worsening of vocabulary (not able to say big word)
- shrinkage of the penis
- strange attraction to underage females
-  fear of minorities and foreign languages 
- random misogynistic beliefs
- uncontrollably watching fox news on repeat
- severe insensitivity
- propagating fake news

These are some but not all of the consequences that come with this app CONSIDER YOURSELF WARNED!!! However since deleting this I have felt free and have learned to love everybody despite our differences. I am proud to say that I have since donated to the BLM movement and have been accepting of different people and different cultures.
